Articles.Content: These have got to be some of the most beautiful craft I've ever designed with stock parts!
I must say, the AC-130's fuselage was amazing.

What you've got there is a gunship, not an AC-130, because an AC-130 has three types of weapons, whereas this has only rockets, Also, the engines are in the wrong configuration, as thee AC-130 had all engines on the wings, and were Propellers (Of course, being stock, you couldnt get Props.
No need to be hyper-critical of other peoples work Krosulhah. I personally loved them!

What you've got there is a gunship, not an AC-130, because an AC-130 has three types of weapons, whereas this has only rockets, Also, the engines are in the wrong configuration, as thee AC-130 had all engines on the wings, and were Propellers (Of course, being stock, you couldnt get Props.

No unfortunately there are no propellers in the stock parts, at all. I wish there was, but parts for aircraft are kind of limited as of 0.23...

I'm trying to figure out a way to utilise explosions... Like, when you blow something up and the game fires off parts 1000s of metres... I'm seeing if I can work this to become a debris firing cannon!
I'll be uploading all my .craft files, tonight... I hope you guys have fun playing with it... if anyone works out a way of aiming their shots, please let me know

If anybody wants to mess around with the .craft file... please be my guest...

Let me know what you come up with
